page.title: 05Our Church and its Services
page.content: I like it when people put confetti on you.When you get married you go to Church in a nice car.The bridesmaids sometimes go in the same car as the bride.People get married in Church because they will stay together and will be blessed by God. {The Altar:}The altar is a sort of table. It has a rug over it and it reminds us of Jesus from when he was on the cross.Before it was used for sacrifices and the blood used to go to the god to feed them. {The Font.The}font is made of stone or} marble or lead.You will find them as you walk through the door.In the 15th century they made it with wood.The Norman fonts were not like ours they could move theirs about but we cannot move ours.
